song_lyrics: Nirbhay charaṇ chhe Nāthnā, sevo shraddhāe sant;
Avar upāy aḷagā karī, samajo sār siddhant... Nirbhay° 1
Suṇī sukh lokāloknā, shīd karo chho shoch;
E to udambare faḷ vaḷagyā, thaḍ thakī te ṭoch... Nirbhay° 2
Em vaḷagyā viṣhay pānchamā, nar sur aj īsh;
Adhik nūnya emā nathī, Ravi Shashī Suresh... Nirbhay° 3
Māṭe ūnḍu vichārī antare, kharī karavī khoḷya;
Niṣhkuḷānand Prabhupad pekhī, jyā jyā jāy tyā roḷ... Nirbhay° 4
title: Nirbhay charaṇ chhe Nāthnā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-419: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
